name: GoldWatches.com
overview:
GoldWatches.com was created with over three decades of experience in the manufacturing and distribution of fine luxury gold and diamond watches, thereby creating this unique opportunity to offer you the finest in luxurious timepieces at wholesale prices. While we specialize in quality solid gold and high-end watches, we also offer a wide selection of elegant solid gold and diamond menâ€™s jewelry including solid gold (and diamond) cufflinks, matching stud sets, tie-tacs and other fine menâ€™s gold accessories to fit any budget.

Goldwatches.com deals directly with a number of watch companies in Switzerland, Italy, U.S. and around the world. We select them because of their reputation for excellent design, quality and workmanship. As we buy large quantities of luxurious gold and diamond watches for distribution throughout North America, we receive the finest luxury watches at sharply reduced prices hence our markup is very low, and we are able to pass the savings on to you, the customer, at tremendous discounts.
